title: Slums in Industrial Zone (I) shall be allowed to be redeveloped in-situ without going through the process of change of zone
clause_text: Slums in Industrial Zone (I) shall be allowed to be redeveloped in-situ without going through the process of change of zone. In the free-sale component in any zone, in addition to residential uses, all the uses permitted for the original zone shall be permitted. For industrial uses, the segregating distance shall be maintained from the existing industrial unit
section: Development of reservation in Redevelopment for Rehabilitation of Slum Dwellers under Regulation No. 33(10)
